introPara: The Chief Executive Officer and the managing director of Yuva Group, Mr Mahendra Reddy with his well-established career has started with the construction of apartments in different locations of Bengaluru. The Yuva Group also deals with land parcels in different locations. The Yuva group has flourished in recent years and has successfully completed around 10 Projects in different locations. Slowly the Yuva Group with its cognitive group stepped into Villa projects and land projects in future across Bengaluru
